summary: REQ-41 hero <h1> text on Home page appears updated to exactly "Authentic Kerala Spices & Traditional Sweets & Snacks". No evidence of forbidden edits under frontend/src/components/ui. However, additional non-requested project metadata/docs files were modified.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified repository documentation/metadata files not requested by REQ-41 (frontend file summaries).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to update the Home page hero headline text; it does not request updating generated summaries/docs.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified project state tracking file not requested by REQ-41.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to change the Home page hero headline; no requirement mentions updating project_state.json.
